title: Failed to save network & Failed to connect to network (Wifi)
content:
Updated the new update for bug fix and restart my phone, then I cannot connect the Wifi network, I tried to re-add my Wifi netowrk, system tips for me "Failed to save network" (Saved network item disappeared) and "Failed to connect to network"
I tried reset the network setting, but still can't connect.
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3 XL
